sentences.sentence: When I was a lad his age I would laugh at the strangest things.
sentences.translation: 我是他那么大的小伙子时，我常嘲笑一些最奇怪的事情。

sentences.sentence: Just when I was passing the man, he raised his head and gave me the strangest smile ever.
sentences.translation: 就在我走过那个人身边时，他抬起了头，朝我露出了最为奇怪的笑容。

sentences.sentence: The fact that we laugh when other people might feel hopeless is one of the strangest things to learn about British humor.
sentences.translation: 当其他人可能在感到绝望时，我们会大笑，这是关于英国幽默最奇怪的事情之一。
